video.title: Hawaii Five-O (1968)
video.synopsis: Tough cop Steve McGarrett leads his crack team against Hawaii's most notorious criminals, aided by his partner Danno -- and they always "book 'em."

episodes.synopsis: A planted agent has infiltrated the March Foundation, a research organization where Dr. Karl Rathman has been experimenting with forced hypnosis.
episodes.title: The Sleeper

episodes.synopsis: The only link in a series of seemingly unrelated killings may lie in a common horoscope by a famous astrologer.
episodes.title: Horoscope for Murder

episodes.synopsis: The explosion of a bomb-rigged briefcase sets off a bizarre chain of events, including death, drugged deception and espionage.
episodes.title: Deadly Courier

episodes.synopsis: While serving jury duty, Steve McGarrett is the only dissenting vote in a murder trial, holding out for finding the defendant innocent.
episodes.title: The Case Against Philip Christie

episodes.synopsis: When McGarrett's investigation gets too close for comfort, organized crime in Hawaii tries another frame-up of the intrepid officer.
episodes.title: Small Potatoes

episodes.synopsis: Steve McGarrett's friend, congressional hopeful Bobby Tamara, is the target of threats from the leader of Hawaii's National Socialist Movement.
episodes.title: A Distant Thunder

episodes.synopsis: There is a theft during an exhibit of the treasures of King Tutankhamun, arranged by socialite and sculptress Alicia Warren.
episodes.title: Death Mask

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett arranges for the escape of a convict so the man can gather information for him about an effort to organize the Chinese Mafia in Honolulu.
episodes.title: The Pagoda Factor

episodes.synopsis: A spark of rekindled passion fans into love for Danny Williams when his high school sweetheart turns up in Hawaii.
episodes.title: A Long Time Ago

episodes.synopsis: A prominent Canadian businessman registered under an assumed name at a Waikiki Hotel is the victim of a hit-and-run accident.
episodes.title: Why Won't Linda Die?

episodes.synopsis: When a man attempts to assassinate a hypnotically compelling evangelist, Steve McGarrett's interest is more than piqued.
episodes.title: The Miracle Man

episodes.synopsis: Ray Santoro, a member of the Kumu, kills a member of the mainland syndicate to force his way into a partnership with an unwilling nightclub owner.
episodes.title: Number One with a Bullet: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: A manager of popular singer allies with a mainland gangster. When Honolulu hood Ray Santoro is double-crossed in the process, a mob war is imminent.
episodes.title: Number One with a Bullet: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Steve McGarrett's skill and instincts are matched against an impossible crime when a fortress-like, burglar-proof bank is rifled of a fortune.
episodes.title: The Meighan Conspiracy

episodes.synopsis: When McGarrett investigates the death of a young scuba diver, a spinsterish detective novelist tells him she already has the mystery solved.
episodes.title: The Spirit Is Willie

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett tries to warn a young socialite, who has taken a prized ruby with her on vacation, that she may be the next victim of a cunning jewel thief.
episodes.title: The Bark and the Bite

episodes.synopsis: Stringer has snapped a picture of a clandestine meeting between racketeer Tony Alika and Honolulu influence peddler Howard Dramer.
episodes.title: Stringer

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett reluctantly goes after an ex-cop whom he knows and admires, yet also suspects of being the culprit in a string of murders of Honolulu pimps.
episodes.title: The Execution File

episodes.synopsis: Steve McGarrett suspects that Dr. Harvey Danworth is illegally supplying drugs to addicts and he knows he must prepare a case against him.
episodes.title: A Very Personal Matter

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett's desperate pursuit of a maniacal murderer is seriously hampered by a writer who wants to reap big bucks by getting to the killer first.
episodes.title: The Skyline Killer

episodes.synopsis: The Year of the Horse is ushered in tragically when a beautiful Asian girl dies in agony aboard a flight from Bangkok to Honolulu.
episodes.title: The Year of the Horse: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett finds himself caught in the crossfire as a faction of embattled Hawaiian natives takes on the island's underworld.
episodes.title: The Lion in the Streets: Part 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Honolulu policewoman Lori Wilson is on the scene when her husband, Honolulu cop and Five-O recruit Kevin Wilson, is gunned down by bandits.
episodes.title: Who Says Cops Don't Cry?

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett goes after a secret ring of high-society vigilantes who are determined to see that justice is done, even if they have to do it themselves.
episodes.title: Though the Heavens Fall

episodes.synopsis: Jayne Meadows guest stars as an astrologer whose ominous warnings tempt the skeptical McGarrett to follow her clues in his investigation of a murder.
episodes.title: Sign of the Ram

episodes.synopsis: Is the Five-O crew as foolish and inept as they are beginning to appear to the public?
episodes.title: Good Help Is Hard to Find

episodes.synopsis: Someone is trying to convince Joan Carter and everyone she knows that she is mentally ill and is only imagining the frightening attacks on her life.
episodes.title: Image of Fear

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett and his Five-O unit follow the trail of pain and death left by one gun, hoping to recover it before it can wreak even more havoc.
episodes.title: Use a Gun, Go to Hell

episodes.synopsis: McGarrett confronts a pair of political terrorists who are threatening to kill their policewoman hostage unless their demands are met.
episodes.title: Voice of Terror

episodes.synopsis: Steve McGarrett finds himself dealing with apparent psychic phenomena as he tries to trace the whereabouts of a jewel cache worth $2 million.
episodes.title: The Shallow Grave

episodes.synopsis: The residents of a private Hawaiian island dig up the remains of two young people and bury them at sea to ensure that autopsies will not be performed.
episodes.title: The Kahuna

episodes.synopsis: Steve McGarrett and his Five-O crew try to solve the kidnapping of a wealthy socialite, Mrs. Christine Ames.
episodes.title: Labyrinth

episodes.synopsis: Assigned to handle security for an important energy conference, McGarrett and his Five-O agents encounter forces determined to sabotage the meeting.
episodes.title: School for Assassins

episodes.synopsis: Counterfeiter Willie McFee returns to his old game for a worthy cause, but he fails to foresee the luck that gives McGarrett an inkling of his move.
episodes.title: For Old Times Sake

episodes.synopsis: From his gut reaction to Jonas Halloran, a brittle, clever aide-de-camp to Premier Lon Tho of Baradak, Steve McGarrett senses evil in the wind.
episodes.title: The Golden Noose

episodes.synopsis: Three bright young graduate students use radio-controlled airplanes and some homemade scientific creations to steal the royal jewels of Liliuokalani.
episodes.title: The Flight of the Jewels

episodes.synopsis: The murder of a famous Nazi hunter pulls Steve McGarrett and Five-O into the search for a Nazi war criminal.
episodes.title: Clash of Shadows

episodes.synopsis: Someone is waging a bloody vendetta against a band of innocuous birdwatchers.
episodes.title: A Bird in the Hand

episodes.synopsis: A political candidate's promising bid for the U.S. Senate is endangered by the murder of a man who tried to blackmail him.
episodes.title: Morroville Covenant

episodes.synopsis: The series concludes with the final showdown between McGarrett and Wo Fat.
episodes.title: Woe to Wo Fat
